allAppointments - Static variable in class DAO.AppointmentAccess
Observable list of all Appointment objects.
allContacts - Static variable in class DAO.ContactAccess
Observable list of all contact objects.
Appointment - Class in model
Models appointments pertaining to customer, user, and contact.

Constructor for created instance of Appointment.
AppointmentAccess - Class in DAO
Class which provides various means of access to Appointment class, such as retrieving appointment object lists, adding, deleting, and updating Appointment objects, looking up appointments, and converting data from database into Appointment object.
AppointmentAccess() - Constructor for class DAO.AppointmentAccess
 
AppointmentController - Class in controller
Controller class which provides control logic for the various components of the Appointments screen, including: adding, updating, selecting, and deleting appointments; viewing all, current month, and current week appointments in a table that directly corresponds to the applicable appointments table from the database (except that date/times are displayed in user's local time); filtering said table by ID or Title; and viewing three relevant reports in a separate form.
AppointmentController() - Constructor for class controller.AppointmentController
 
AppointmentQueries - Class in DAO
Data access class that holds all database query methods pertaining to the Appointment class.
AppointmentQueries() - Constructor for class DAO.AppointmentQueries
